4.title: Home
4.content: This is the basesesrtrwt Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com . You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: [jekyll12][jekyll-organization] / minima . You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: [jekyll][jekyll-organization] / jekyll .

5.title: UI Components
5.content: To make it as easy as possible to write documentation in plain Markdown, most UI components are styled using default Markdown elements with few additional CSS classes needed.
